id_table_1.caption:
Zero-shot results on Egoschema [34] full set. Methods that
leverage closed-source LLMs are marked in gray. ††\dagger denotes the model is trained with in-domain egocentric videos from Ego4D [14]. 
∗ denotes results on EgoSchema subset. Results of InterVideo and FrozenBiLM are sourced from  [34]. Results of SeViLA are sourced from [40].

id_table_2.caption: Zero-shot results on multi-choice video QA benchmarks.

id_table_3.caption: Evaluation results on MVBench. The results of other approaches are sourced from  [25]. We gray out the results of VideoChat2 because it utilizes extensive manually annotated video data from downstream video benchmarks for video instruction tuning.
